summary:
At Freshworks, my engineering leadership paves the way for innovative solutions to complex business challenges. With a robust expertise in MySQL, I lead by example, setting the technical direction and nurturing a culture of high-quality software development. Our team's commitment to innovation is reflected in the successful migration of Freshsales to OpenSearch, a testament to our collaborative efforts and technical acumen.

My current focus as a Senior Staff Engineer involves spearheading non-functional requirements and prioritizing technical debt, aligning strategies with our product team to ensure the integrity and continual evolution of our systems. The impact of my work is evident in the enhanced performance and reliability of Freshworks' CRM systems, achieved through diligent mentoring and a hands-on approach to architecting sustainable solutions.
headline: Senior Staff Engineer at Freshworks

educations.schoolName: VLB Janakiammal College of Engineering and Technology
Hindusthan College of Arts and Science

position.title: Senior Staff Engineer
position.description: Serving as a senior architect, working closely with product management to break down complex business problems into manageable components and design effective solutions. Led discussions on non-functional requirements (NFRs), creating strategies for metricization and tracking. Provided technical direction to the development team through skeleton code, while mentoring team members on improving code quality and design during reviews. Identified and prioritized technical debt both within the system and across related subsystems, communicating the impact to the product team and aligning on solutions.

position.title: Staff Engineer
position.description:
Acted as an architect, collaborating with the product team to address business challenges by evaluating impacts on platform services and subsystems, ensuring optimal solutions with minimal disruption. Led discussions on non-functional requirements (NFRs), developing solutions for metricization and tracking. Set the technical direction by providing skeleton code and mentoring the team through code and design reviews. Identified technical debt, prioritized it with the product team, and provided clear explanations to align on resolutions.

As an individual contributor, successfully managed the migration of Freshsales from Elasticsearch 1.7 to OpenSearch 2.3, overseeing the entire process until the legacy version was completely phased out.

position.title: Lead Software Engineer
position.description: Served as a technical lead, collaborating with architects to design solutions for business challenges and working closely with the product management team. Played a key role in coding, setting the technical direction, and guiding developers in implementing the solution. Conducted code reviews and led production deployments for various Freshsales CRM modules, including Calendar, Task, and Sales Activity features, along with revamping the landing UI for the Contacts and Leads modules.

position.title: Solutions Architect
position.description:
Experienced in J2EE technologies, including EJB, Servlets, and JSP, with strong expertise in core Java and J2EE components. Proficient in using dependency injection frameworks such as Google Guice and Spring DI within J2EE applications.

Contributed to key modules in banking applications, including Online Bill Payment, Direct Debits, Foreign Trade, and Corporate Internet Banking. Played a pivotal role in architecting banking solutions aligned with European banking regulations
